name: rabeqi
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0
body: |- wceq(crab(s0, c0, w0), crab(s0, c1, w0))

body.origin:
|- wceq(crab(s0, c0, w0), crab(s0, c1, w0))
-| wnfc(s0, c0)
-| wnfc(s0, c1)
-| wceq(c0, c1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(crab(s0, c0, w0), crab(s0, c1, w0))
-| wnfc(s0, c0)
-| wnfc(s0, c1)
-| wceq(c0, c1)

|- wceq(crab(s0, c0, w0), crab(s0, c1, w0))
-| wnfc(s0, c1)
-| wceq(c0, c1)
-| diffsc(s0, c0)

|- wceq(crab(s0, c0, w0), crab(s0, c1, w0))
-| wceq(c0, c1)
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c1)

comment: Equality theorem for restricted class abstractions. Inference form of ~ rabeq . (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)
